page.title: 07A Day in my Life
page.content: Every school day I get up at 8 o'clock in the morning and get washed and dressed for school.For my breakfast I have coffee and a biscuit.When it is 8.52 I go to school,which starts at 9.00.When I get to school I feed the animals and we have morning lessons like maths and reading. At 12 o'clock we have our lunch,I have packed lunch. Sometimes we have P.E. in the afternoon or we do project work.We are doing a project on the Domesday Book and we have drawn a plan of our classroom and a picture of the front of our house. Some of us have planted seeds to grow and we are doing a book on frogs and chicks too.At the moment we have got some eggs in the incubator.When we go home at 3.10 I have my dinner then I read or watch television before I go to bed at 7.00.
